documents.document: Good luck to @howardbell98 - travelling with @BritAthletics today for the first time - keep me up to date https://t.co/qMdfKYIHxH
@CazPetrie - remind me to talk to you about @HeyPobble next week #global #writing #community #Bett2017
@eLearning_Laura @ICTEvangelist @Joe_Moretti @Abdulchohan who makes these? Can't find them on amazon
Always good listening to @Abdulchohan #Bett2017
Great night with @AppleEDU at their #scale event #London
Great fun at #Bett2017 today - especially exciting about getting stuck into @Minecraft #MinecraftEdu https://t.co/5DhMCJJkuN
I #ScrumTogether with @DoveMen to win #SCOvIRE RBS 6 Nations tickets. Pick your match by 8pm & you could too https://t.co/QutRWeaQcu
Learning more from the team at #GoogleExpeditions at #Bett2017
Really exciting updates on demo from @Showbie hopefully available from tomorrow
@pamelalamela @MirCWalsh considering applying - anyone know when the deadline is? Says it will open in early January... #stillwaiting
Not a bad hotel view if you have to work in London for a few days #Bett2017 I am on my way https://t.co/FzD5hdr8fC
@fraserspeirs @timkeller just on the DLR. now
@mcoutts81 so glad I had them for the train down today - they are brilliant
@VirginTrains have been unable to get any work done - very frustrating
@VirginTrains both. Not loading websites fully - everyone seems to be having the same problem. Works on Google eventually but nothing else
@VirginTrains first class wifi edinburgh > London is awful. Complete waste of time - unable to get any work done
@annaiteach sounds good - I get into kings cross at 11:50 Where are you based tomorrow?
#AirPods just in time for #Bett2017 and @AppleEDU conference - ready for London now. https://t.co/iSysca8Soq
@annaiteach I need to catch a coffee... lots to discuss
@BookCreatorApp they're using new iPads. It's as if I have received an update that they can't
@blondeteacher1 https://t.co/at1DAmebxE has all the info - 8 units to complete
It's official - worth a couple of CPD sessions #appleEDU https://t.co/EhzlfFgPnG
Pupils reporting issues with @BookCreatorApp - unable to open a book I made last year when I send it to them... no update available #help
#Appleteacher done
Apple Teacher available in UK - currently working through the iPad course. It's far too easy... not really going to hold much value
Another easy cup draw for the Hibees! TBH - would worry more about #raith than #hearts
#Bett2017 and @AppleEDU leadership conference next week - London, can't wait!
@stuartstorar @The_Tman10 I know for a fact that they don't
@annaiteach can't wait! Get in on Wednesday morning
This's is HUGE - any idea when it will be widely available?@BookCreatorApp https://t.co/GuMWXUrz1f
@mrmartinwillis looking to see if i can send music into their app
@mrmartinwillis unfortunately not many children have music in their music app... some experimenting to be done I think...
A great day with @colinmackay1974 from @GoogleForEdu looking at opportunities for using #VR in the classroom
Has anyone got recommendations? Looking for an app to allow pupils to listen to music whilst working in another app - Spotify not included
@ManUtd any idea when or if ticket applications will be made available to members for any remaining tickets for Sunday's Liverpool match?
Have taken the plunge - its gonna be a long 6 weeks... #apple #ipaded #AirPods https://t.co/41Th7DJ4YK
@OwenWright welcome - in fact I think we both earn a free rise if u use it
@Village_Hotels yes please... can't find them anywhere
@Village_Hotels anywhere online I can find Edinburgh's festive opening hours?
@MacLeodSteve @RobertGlen3 same every week - incompetent refs who've been told by @ScottishFA to do anything they can to hurt @HibsOfficial
@mattelder_ffp @howesy37 it was a blatant red card but the anti-hibs movement continues from @ScottishFA
@andrewjewell thanks Andrew
Anyone want a gr8 new spelling app?Teachers please take a look https://t.co/NyAWsgJ6oP #ipad #ipaded #pedagoofriday #spelling #teacherlife
@InPlayKing100 Thank you so much for taking the time to complete it😀
@InPlayKing100 yes - our older pupils own and use their own devices. We also have 1:1 devices which are school owned for younger pupils
@InPlayKing100 @ICT_MrP they have their own devices and passcodes but these are shared with their class teacher - why do you ask?
Anyone want a great new spelling app? Please share - Teachers please take 2 minutes to answer some quick questions https://t.co/NyAWsgJ6oP
Anyone in London today and able to get to the Regent Street Apple Store? They have airpods ready to collect - anyone able to pick them up?
@fraserspeirs when about did u order? Gonna have to wait 6 weeks
Martin has given you a FREE Uber ride (up to £10). To claim your free gift, sign up using this link: https://t.co/R8jimo2OG9
As of today - I will only be using this twitter account as a professional one. To follow my personal channel - follow @memartinwillis thanks
@d_gray_writer @NutmegMagazine great thanks - do the glorious Hibees get a mention?
@d_gray_writer @NutmegMagazine made the mistake of buying from Amazon... do u k is when they will have stock?
@NutmegMagazine any idea when they will be dropping through letterboxes?
Thanks @codeorg getting ready for #HourofCode at @edinburghacad next week
@forbes_bell that might be the funniest tweet I've ever read... he isn't that bad!
@OwenWright really?!
@OwenWright anything exciting?
I am claiming this one! Thanks @adobe now able to be used in primary school with new age rating of 4+ https://t.co/rszfnitzwE
Can't believe they chose this weekend to bring this out :( https://t.co/H7DlNkorNl
@blzzrd Hi there - do you know if you have any stockists in Edinburgh?
Great news! 👍 https://t.co/gTokY40yp9
@howardbell98 @marathonbet @HibsOfficial have applied for places - here's hoping
@andrewjewell @fraserspeirs also can't restore iPad as doesn't own the email address...
@andrewjewell @fraserspeirs here's one for you - child enters false email address as AppleID - can't update or download apps
@UberUKsupport why can't I update my mobile number? #stranded
@UberUK any idea why u can't update my mobile details #stranded
@AmazonUK how do I notify you that something you are saying was delivered yesterday still hasn't arrived?
@marksandspencer have destroyed a disappointing effort from @johnlewisretail effort if you ask me
This is very exciting to hear @AdobeSpark would take your apps near the top of our app list... if we could only use… https://t.co/fr7rD9Nron
@ICT_MrP @ChaucerJun indeed - unfortunately as we insist on using children's appleIDs with accurate dates of birth it's not an option sadly
@ICT_MrP @ChaucerJun yeah - unfortunately our pupils aren't aged 12 so our MDM won't permit - would also leave teachers on risky ground
@ChaucerJun @ICT_MrP - would love to use it in our primary school but sadly can't as it's rated 12+ @Adobe need to look at who's using it
Anyone in Edinburgh got a set of #GoPro cameras I can borrow for an exciting project? #staffpanto @GoPro @edinburghacad
Great session @GWC_News with @iteach_uk and @annaiteach working with @iTeachDL from other schools https://t.co/u7c1QgqsIl
Great morning @esmsedinburgh today discussing VLE
All ready for tomorrow's Digital Leader LAB tomorrow @GWC_News #learning #sharing #ipaded
1/2 A couple of lovely messages this morning asking if I was going for @HibsOfficial nomination again.
2/2Unfortunately work now busier than ever and not sure I could commit to what the role has become - hope we get two great new reps though.
@OwenWright why?! ☺️ Have they mentioned this again? Not sure I would apply again seeing what it became -
@ICTEvangelist absolutely - wasn't having a go... more asking really! Would love to have the time! Just curious how / when the fit it in!
@ICTEvangelist same, how do they have the time to blog?!
@OwenWright it's fine though... the kids annual has it covered! https://t.co/XCNZIH6DqO
Keen? @howardbell98 TICKET INFO | AYR UTD AWAY https://t.co/f0r66jkgb8
Really interesting day @KAGlasgow discussing VLE #APPLED #education #elearning
@lhpMoore @ClassDojo does an awful lot more these days - and apparently well. came too late to the game for us as solutions already found.
@ProfTomkins eh? Petrofac, and third, second and championship titles? The museum behind you is for a club that died a long time ago
@HibsOfficial - wish we could head what the '91 boys are saying... get the tannoy sorted - awful
#finally what kept you @HibsOfficial ? https://t.co/92Cb54t5Fm
@OfficialBWFC RT? Edinburgh touring school team looking for friendly match midday Thurs 2nd February 2017 - pls get in touch @mrmartinwillis
@pnefc RT? Edinburgh touring school team looking for friendly match midday Thursday 2nd February 2017 - pls get in touch @mrmartinwillis
#Preston #schools #football Edinburgh team (U12) looking for a friendly fixture midday on Thur 2nd February 2017 - coaches pls get in touch
@OneKindOfBlue missed that thanks!
Honestly thought we would get a release date for #AirPods today https://t.co/NUAZX2Z88K
Experimented with #swift playgrounds today though - kids loved it and showed some great skills https://t.co/zHbNLQC8sa
The only thing that really excites me about today's announcement is the return of a black mac book pro 💻
Not sure how reliable this is... but @apple employee today suggested #AirPods still haven't been delivered - looking like a November release
@BookCreatorApp 5.0 sounds as if it will be incredible! Any chance of Beta access?
Well @waitrose - these are disguising #vile #inedible https://t.co/E0cWr4pOik
@OwenWright ? Training top?
